name: Tea-xas Farm Defenders
description:
You are a cow farmer in Texas. Suddenly you notice a weird flying ship. They land at the edge of your farm and are coming for you cows to use their milk in their tea. You must protect your cows at all cost.

 

You win the game by killing the enemies. You do that by placing down different types towers. Be warned all the towers cost money and the only way to get said money is to kill enemies. You win the game by surviving all incoming waves.

Feedback: https://forms.gle/K29h9mSBeaXXcXxA6
